name: steady stockinette mitts
notes:
timeless details and warm hands are just my cup of tea. with rolled edges and a simple stockinette fabric the steady stockinette mitts are a great fit for the whole family.

dk weight yarn, i used knit picks palette yarn held double (effectively 100g = 231 yards)

us size #3 (3.25 mm) circular needles, or needles needed to get gauge. mitts can be knit in magic loop or dpns
